channel.title: Ask me on A Happy PhD
channel.description: Recent content in Ask me on A Happy PhD

item.title: Ask A Happy Ph.D. - Student edition
item.description: This time I would like to turn the mike over to you, PhD students, and let you tell me what you want to hear about in this blog (I will do a separate one for supervisors and supervision later on). What would you like to know about doing a Ph.D., or being a (happier, more productive) PhD student?
